Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Jett suggests taking a stab on the Pirates, as Mitch Keller hasn't pitched terribly over his last two starts, notching 11.1 total innings with five earned on 18 hits and zero walks in those two.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Royals' last three road games.
Thirteen of the Pirates' last 17 home games after playing the previous day have gone OVER the total runs line.
Five of the Royals' last six games against National League opponents have gone OVER the total runs line.
Others: The Pirates need a better effort on both sides Saturday.
Bryan Reynolds has recorded two or more total bases in each of the Pirates' last 11 games at PNC Park against AL Central opponents that held a winning record.
Bryan Reynolds has recorded at least one hit in each of the Pirates' last 12 games at PNC Park against AL Central opponents that held a winning record.
